person.persName: Thomas McGrain, Jr. (Jefferson Co, KY, & Harrison Co, IN, clerk, flour dealer & merchant)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, and Harrison County, Indiana, clerk, merchant, and flour dealer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas McGrain and Matilda Reid McGrain. Married to Margaret Griffin McGrain in Indiana on November 20, 1856. Father of Daniel G. McGrain, Tilli McGrain, Zetta McGrain, and Kate S. McGrain. Family owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1840. Clerk in Harrison County, Indiana, in 1860. Signed a petition as a flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector.
